text:
[trapit-site-2014/master] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/e2c5a9a2ce20cd743b9d7258cf10b5007f999bd8|e2c5a9a2ce20>: Added stating server info to the push task and optimized images.
 - gastonfig

OK <@U0260V1BX>, I did some research last night and this morning on the small content blocks for the site. It looks like the small blocks with the corner cut off and a stroke around can be done. However, I don't think we can add a drop shadow to anything that isn't a square (with all its sides) or an ellipse.
ok, let me think about this. thanks for investigating. I need to decide whether it's even worth it to cut the corner off on some of these elements :)
thanks gaston
Sounds good. I'll keep Googling this in case I missed a technique that would work.
Hey <@U0260V1BX>, a couple more questions for you RE: the What People are Saying carousel. 1. Do we want fade or slide, 2. What do we want to do and how do we want it to behave on mobile?
Asking because those answers will help me choose the technique to use here.
1. fade
2. good question. let me think about that
sorry i havent been able to get you any mobile stuff
i am working on some trapit product stuff that took a lot longer than i'd anticipated
i can mock up what it should look like on mobile
No worries. The only thing I need sooner than later is understanding interactions. Do we want people to swipe, etc.
i almost think maybe we should stack the featured testimonials on mobile
instead of treating it as a slideshow
Those hero areas are fairly complex and I want to make sure I get it sorted out before moving to less complex areas.
and maybe put a "view more" button that would expose the non-featured? just thinking about how to prioritize. i dont want unnecessary slideshows on mobile.
OK
Thanks. That helps.
sure.
hey, since we’re talking Trapit, what’s up with the “About” and the “Careers” pages on the site? are we building those and managing content for them as well?
OH
yes
sorry i havent give you guys any info about those pages yet.
let me get together some files and info on dynamic/static etc for you
ooooh that would be awesome
A file was shared
<@U0260V1BX> Sorry to be so annoying but the more I think about this hero section the more I think we may need a quick powwow. Whenever you can. Totally cool if we need to wait until Th or Fri.
gaston: I can schedule for tomorrow at 11? I'd like to be there as well.
<@U02618EV1>: I can schedule for tomorrow at 11? I'd like to be there as well.
i think they’re talking right now, <@U026AP8CM>
<@U02618EV1>: & <@U0260V1BX> can I get a synopsis after the powwow?
(in a meeting)
yeah it wasnt much of a powwow
it was just gaston asking me a question and me answering it and then walking away. <@U026AP8CM> you didnt miss anything
Although that answer Melissa gave me just made my day and my headache is gone.
hey <@U02618EV1> i've got a question for you about those hero images when you're back :)
ok <@U02618EV1> and <@U02613K0X> : you can find a PSD and jpegs + annotations here:
clients/TrapIt/Trapit Website 2014/Secondary Pages 16April
Sure thing. I'm back.

[trapit-site-2014/] 3 new commits:
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/8ee59664a2ac678f02c102dc50374ce8ea293737|8ee59664a2ac>: Refactored how we display hero images.
 - gastonfig
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/4da14ff0ef57bc00432b412beab65c984b6001c0|4da14ff0ef57>: Added slideshow to the hero section.
 - gastonfig
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/b6ac2fcb21f94ef69790c85e0db17f3d46710704|b6ac2fcb21f9>: Removed nav from slider.
 - gastonfig
Hey <@U0260V1BX> I vaguely remember you mentioned something about the What People Are Saying videos being hosted in Vimeo. Is that correct?
Youtube I believe
Fantastic. Thanks!

[trapit-site-2014/master] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/ee2e29baab4004c7a3f2921184abfebd586a33be|ee2e29baab40>: Added Magic PopUp and video support for the hero slider.
 - gastonfig
